name: Cupid Defense Force
description:
Story

Chad Chadsworth is planning a lovely evening all to himself, but a dangerous wrench is thrown into his plans when Cupid decides to pay him a visit and tells him to join him on a night out.

Tag along to find out what nefarious plans Cupid has for Chad.

Credits

Lead Programmer:  Pierre "Wr3nch4476" Jonatan Jordaan

Artists:  Francis Terblanche & Pierre "Wr3nch4476" Jonatan Jordaan

Lead Game Designers:  Francis Terblanche & Pierre "Wr3nch4476 Jonatan Jordaan

Lead Sound:  Francis Terblanche

Lead Producer / QA: Francis Terblanche

Controls

Full PC support

  • Movement - WASD
  • Space - Jump
  • Ctrl - Crouch
  • E - Interact
  • Esc - Pause Menu 
  • Left Mouse Button  - Fire A Gun in Hand

Very Important Control

  • Alt + F4 - When the game freaks out or when you are done with

Teammates

Pierre Jonatan Jordaan: https://itch.io/profile/wr3nch4476

Francis Terblanche:  https://itch.io/profile/fsthalo

Install instructions

Download the Installer for your OS and install the game and enjoy.

Currently, only Windows is supported. Sorry Linux and macOS users.

Our hacker boy still needs to learn how to make macOS install files as well as Linux install files.
